title: post an image!
content:
Hi everyone,  
This is a really stupid question but I would like to know which html tag that I can use to embed an image to a post. I tried and [IMG] but none working so far. Thanks you very much!

 [‹ Edit a forum post](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029083543/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40778 "Go to previous forum topic") [Favorite Pirate Font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029083543/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40766 "Go to next forum topic")
author: catdogucd

comments.content:
bottom left of the text entry box “insert image”

-=®=-

_bottom left of the text entry box “insert image”_

But you can only see that if you have the Flash 8 Player installed on your computer...
